name: Immersive Ventures
tag_list: spherical-video, 360-degree, media, immersive, street-view, streetview, mapping, gps, gis, situational-awareness
overview:
Immersive Ventures is an Interactive Media company that focuses on offering end-to-end solutions to easily create, distribute and play spherical video productions.

Immersive Ventures technology development, products and patent portfolio is only part of the story. Strategic partnerships with some of the largest brands and specialists in the entertainment, mapping and government / military markets help produce solutions that fit the unique needs of each of these segments.

At the extremes, spherical video is disruptive and addictive, it provides a unique and entertaining experiences for entertainment which engages users and gives them a sense of being there. Our video is also an efficient way to collect and share location-based information, we were the first to collect streetview imagery for Google and we have continued to evolve the technology and incorporate 3D augmented reality tools for enhancing the content and monetization.

acquisitions.source_description: Immersive Ventures Inc. announces the acquisition of the assets of Immersive Media Company and IM Sensors Inc
